data.system_settings: iPhone 8 Plus, iPad Air 2 - iOS 12 Public Beta 7
data.actual_result: The address bar doesn't get hidden when scrolling down and nothing happens when clicking on the status bar.
data.expected_result: You should be scrolled to the top when clicking on it.
data.short_description: [Website bug] [Safari] Tapping on the iOS status bar to scroll to the top doesn't work for most dev portal pages
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to the Developer Portal - Open the Documentation - Scroll a bit down - Click on the status bar to scroll to the top - Observe it
